scripts.deploy:avalanche: npx hardhat --network avalanche run mainnetDeployment/avalancheDeployment.js && node scripts/serializeDeployment.js mainnetDeployment/avalancheDeploymentOutput.json
scripts.deploy:fuji: npx hardhat --network fuji run mainnetDeployment/fujiDeployment.js && node scripts/serializeDeployment.js mainnetDeployment/fujiDeploymentOutput.json
scripts.deploy:dev: npx hardhat --network dev run mainnetDeployment/mainnetLocalForkDeployment.js && node scripts/serializeDeployment.js mainnetDeployment/localForkDeploymentOutput.json
scripts.deploy:polygon: npx hardhat --network dev run mainnetDeployment/mainnetLocalForkDeploymentPolygon.js && node scripts/serializeDeployment.js mainnetDeployment/localForkDeploymentOutput.json
scripts.deploy:hardhat: npx hardhat --network hardhat run mainnetDeployment/mainnetLocalForkDeployment.js && node scripts/serializeDeployment.js mainnetDeployment/localForkDeploymentOutput.json
